meanings.definition: Opposed to the use of filibustering tactics.
meanings.sent1: The antifilibuster group worked to stop the long speeches.
meanings.sent2: She had an antifilibuster stance against delaying tactics.
meanings.sent3: The antifilibuster sign read 'Let's get to the point!'
meanings.sent4: His antifilibuster attitude cut through the unnecessary talk.
meanings.sent5: The antifilibuster approach aimed to keep things moving efficiently.

meanings.definition: A person or group who opposes filibustering.
meanings.sent1: The antifilibuster was determined to prevent delays.
meanings.sent2: She joined the antifilibuster movement to promote efficiency.
meanings.sent3: The antifilibuster joked, 'I'm here to speed things up!'
meanings.sent4: He was a strong antifilibuster in the committee.
meanings.sent5: The antifilibuster's goal was to ensure timely decisions.

meanings.sent1: They antifilibustered by proposing time limits.
meanings.sent2: She decided to antifilibuster the filibustering attempt.
meanings.sent4: The group antifilibustered to prevent unnecessary delays.
meanings.sent5: To antifilibuster effectively, one must stay focused on the topic.
